titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common-Councell assembled presented to the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled: with the answers of both Houses to the said petition.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons. Proceedings. 1648-10-16.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords. Proceedings. 1648-10-16.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the honorable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Requesting increased financial support of the clergy.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
